messages.noGetRequest: Sorry, our system do not accept GET requests
messages.invalidToken: Sorry, mummy said I do not have to talk with strangers...
messages.noCredentials: I'm not a magician: you have got to tell me your credentials in order to get the right information.
messages.badLogin: You probably mistyped something into your username or password: check them twice next time.
messages.unirestException: Something went wrong while contacting esse3. Probably it depends on cineca.
messages.unknownError: Ooops... Something went wrong while processing your request. Don't blame on us for that!
messages.badParameters: Sorry, the parameters you passed me are malformed.
